  • Method Details

    • addFaction

      public void addFaction​(Faction faction)
      Adds a Faction to the factions list and sets its key as the given faction's name
      Parameters:
      faction - The faction to be added

    • calculateNewPeopleCount

      public void calculateNewPeopleCount​(int foodRest, int agriculture)
      If the food left is a positive amount people are added to the island otherwise the population is reduced
      Parameters:
      foodRest - The amount of food that is left
      agriculture - The percentage of agriculture on the island

    • corruptFaction

      public void corruptFaction​(int index, int amount)
      Corrupts a faction corresponding to the given index of the factions list and reduce the loyalist' satisfaction
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the faction to be corrupted
      amount - The amount of time to corrupt it

    • getTotalPopulation

      public int getTotalPopulation()
      Returns:
      The number of person on the island

    • getGlobalSatisfaction

      public int getGlobalSatisfaction()
      Calculates the global satisfaction with the given calculus the sum of the amount of supporters times the satisfaction for each faction divided by the total population
      Returns:
      The global satisfaction for every factions

    • getFactionByName

      public Faction getFactionByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a faction for the given name the faction is created with the sandbox values if it does not exist
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the faction to be returned
      Returns:
      The faction corresponding to the given name

    • getFactionCorruptionCost

      public int getFactionCorruptionCost​(int index, int amount)
      Calculate the cost for the given faction times the amount of corruption to be bought
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the faction to be corrupted
      amount - The amount of time to corrupt it
      Returns:
      The cost of the faction's corruption

    • getFactions

      public java.util.Collection<Faction> getFactions()
      Returns:
      A list of the factions

    • getFactionIndex

      public int getFactionIndex​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the faction
      Returns:
      The index of the faction corresponding to the given name
